\pard\nowidctlpar\fi720\sl480\slmult1\cf1 (b) the amount of public funds provided to the authorized committees of each candidate pursuant to this chapter and the contributions received and expenditures made by each such candidate and the authorized committees of such candidate, in each election during the four preceding calendar years;\cf0\par
